title: opendrive: unable to handle files with + or &
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

When using OpenDrive rclone is not handling files containing `+` or `&` correctly.
The files get uploaded to the correct destination, but an `object not found` error is returned.
Afterwards they can be seen by `rclone ls`, but `rclone cat` fails with a `directory not found` error.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

`v1.44-001-g67703a73-beta`

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

`Linux 4.18.12 #1-NixOS SMP Wed Oct 3 23:59:28 UTC 2018 x86_64 GNU/Linux`

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

OpenDrive

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
 date | rclone rcat -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test/0x2B-+-'; \
  rclone ls -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test'; \
  rclone cat -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test/0x2B-+-'

 date | rclone rcat -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test/0x26-&-'; \
  rclone ls -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test'; \
  rclone cat -vv 'TestOpenDrive:test/0x26-&-'
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2018/10/15 23:25:30 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.44-001-g67703a73-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "rcat" "-vv" "TestOpenDrive:test/0x2B-+-"]
2018/10/15 23:25:30 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/fabian/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/10/15 23:25:31 DEBUG : Starting OpenDrive session with ID: f017e48f4946e0d7683a4445e9d6039a2bbdf5b6d5025fc5756e0c095ab264e4
2018/10/15 23:25:31 DEBUG : OpenDrive root 'test': File to upload is small (30 bytes), uploading instead of streaming
2018/10/15 23:25:34 DEBUG : 0x2B-+-: Uploading chunk 0, size=30, remain=0
2018/10/15 23:25:37 ERROR : 0x2B-+-: Failed to copy: object not found
2018/10/15 23:25:37 Failed to rcat: object not found

2018/10/15 23:25:37 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.44-001-g67703a73-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "ls" "-vv" "TestOpenDrive:test"]
2018/10/15 23:25:37 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/fabian/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/10/15 23:25:38 DEBUG : Starting OpenDrive session with ID: 63e047fd8c83de98eaf6ad2f5e773d9afa08474acbe5b6feae605af5411d34cd
       30 0x2B-+-
2018/10/15 23:25:39 DEBUG : 2 go routines active
2018/10/15 23:25:39 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.44-001-g67703a73-beta" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "ls" "-vv" "TestOpenDrive:test"]

2018/10/15 23:25:39 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.44-001-g67703a73-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "cat" "-vv" "TestOpenDrive:test/0x2B-+-"]
2018/10/15 23:25:39 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/fabian/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/10/15 23:25:40 DEBUG : Starting OpenDrive session with ID: 65ccf4e70a4fa8879a83c5bd166aba3814293e7844a22666a2717e4444e25d8a
2018/10/15 23:25:44 ERROR : : error listing: directory not found
2018/10/15 23:25:44 Failed to cat: directory not found
```
